panels.description:
Condensed "Node Performance" widget for small screens.

🟩 Consensus Network Connectivity

🟨 Cert Processing Latency: p95 shared objects 

🟧 p50 Process Certificate (Internal Processing Only)

🟥 Average Time To Generate Consensus Proposal Latency

🟦 Consensus Proposal Rate

⬜️ Consensus Performance

⚙️ NARWHAL
panels.title: 🟩 Network Connectivity    🟨 Cert Latency p95    🟧 Process Certificate p50    🟥 Proposal Latency    🟦 Proposal Rate    ⬜️ Consensus Performance
